author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Define a new scenario D41 with the more recent version of HGCal geometry (C8). Also changes are made to overall system (O3 derived from O2) and MTD (I9 derived from I7) which need to be changed
 
#### PR validation:

New workflow needs to be defined but can work only after PR with new etl is merged

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

It is not a backport
title: Phase2-hgx184 Add a new scenario D41 with T14+C8+I9+O3
